getNamespace().Description: Returns the namespace used by this address.

LocalSocketAddress(java.lang.String).Description: Creates an instance with a given name in the @B_android#net#LocalSocketAddress#Namespace#ABSTRACT_E@ namespace

Parameters: LocalSocketAddress.Namespace: namespace the name should be created in.

getName().Description: Retrieves the string name of this address

ClassDesc: A UNIX-domain (AF_LOCAL) socket address. For use with android.net.LocalSocket and android.net.LocalServerSocket. On the Android system, these names refer to names in the Linux abstract (non-filesystem) UNIX domain namespace.
